title: Bellow’s Breath
description: Sit in a comfortable position. Lengthen your spine. Rest your hands on your knees. Close your eyes. Take a deep, exaggerated breath in, expanding your belly. Actively exhale with an equally exaggerated breath. Do not strain. Repeat this cycle for 10 breaths at a medium pace. Rest for a minute in Corpse. Keep chin parallel to floor Expand belly with each inhalation Draw belly toward spine with each exhalation
alignment_cues: Maintain steady breath throughout the pose
Keep proper alignment based on pose type
Listen to your body and modify as needed
